    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        public int deposit(double amount)
        Deposit the amount of money, also records the monthly deposit.
        Overrides:
        deposit in class Account
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of money to be deposited
        Returns:
        0 if success

      • withdraw

        public int withdraw(double amount)
        Withdraw the amount of money. Check if the available balance will go below 0, and check if it reaches over the maximum withdrawal times. If so, reject the withdrawal. If success, increment the monthlyWithdrawalTimes by 1.
        Overrides:
        withdraw in class Account
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of money to be withdrawn
        Returns:
        0 if success else error code

      • computeInterest

        public double computeInterest()
        Calculate the interest in this account. Easy formula: interest = deposit * interest rate
        Returns:
        the interest

      • computeFees

        public double computeFees()
        Calculate the monthly maintenance fee. Savings accounts have a fixed monthly fee (FIXED_MONTHLY_FEE). The fee is waived if the customer deposited over M(LEASE_MONTHLY_DEPOSIT) this month.
        Returns:
        the maintenance fee

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Give a brief description of a savings account
        Overrides:
        toString in class Account
        Returns:
        the account summary
